title: Classic Figure Skating
description: Glide through the golden years of figure skating and recall the elegant champions who dazzled audiences on ice!

questions.question: Which American figure skater won five consecutive World Championships and the 1948 and 1952 Olympic gold medals?

Which ice skating pair, known for their romantic on-ice partnership, won Olympic gold for Great Britain in 1984?

Which Norwegian figure skater, three-time Olympic champion, later became a Hollywood movie star?

The tragic 1961 plane crash in Brussels killed the entire U.S. figure skating team on their way to which event?

Which American pair, whose Olympic dreams were dashed when the male partner was injured before the 1980 Games, became beloved national favorites?
